Package mk.imdb.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IMDbAPI
    Static class that offers methods for calling the imdbapi.org API.
    IMDbConstants
    Class that contains a series of constants used by other classes in this library.
    IMDbParameters
    Abstract class that represents a list of parameter useful to make the API calls.
    IMDbSearchByIdParameters
    Class that represents the list of parameters for a search by id API call.
    IMDbSearchByTitleParameters
    Class that represents the list of parameters for a search by title API call.
    IMDbURLCreator
    This class provides methods for creating well formed query URL.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IMDbVerbosity
    Enumerations with the possible verbosity.
